question_title: What will be the value of "Crude Oil Prices: Brent - Europe" on 2026-02-13?
summary: Brent crude is trading ~$66-67/barrel with 11 days to resolution. Historical volatility of ~6% over this period suggests moderate uncertainty. Bearish fundamentals (EIA forecasts $56 average for 2026, OPEC supply surplus) are offset by geopolitical risk premium from US-Iran tensions. Distribution centered near current price with slight downward bias from fundamentals and upside tail from geopolitical risk.

factors.description: Current price anchor at $66-67/barrel, well-established market level
EIA bearish 2026 outlook ($56/barrel average) suggests downward pressure over time
Geopolitical tensions (US-Iran) adding volatility premium, caused +3% spike recently
OPEC+ supply increases expected to create surplus in 2026
Short 11-day horizon limits magnitude of fundamental-driven moves
